name: YLOE
description:
this is  "YLOE"  short abbreviation for your life on earth   , it's an app  wish you can know how many days , weeks , hours or even minuts you lived .  you just entrer your birthday and let YLOE do the worck, you may  have somme  struggle inserting   if you do  .. just click on espace to retape  or try egain 😊 . 

Stay tuned for updates !
